issue.subject: Image for collapse/expand fieldset in metadata form
issue.description: The collapse/expand image for filedset in metadata form doesn't change on click.

journals.notes:
I just had a look at it:
- there is a "strange" @src@ attribute in the @a@ element, with wrong URLs for images. It changes when opening/closing.
(\administrator\components\com_easysdi_core\libraries\easysdi\catalog\editMetadata.js)
- there is also an icon (icon-arrow-down) that doesn't change
(\components\com_easysdi_catalog\libraries\easysdi\FormHtmlGenerator.php#L302)

I think the icon is a good way, we could simply patch to change icon class on expand/collapse, and remove the wierd src attribute in the @a@ element. Proposal includes adding a specific class, to allow overriding of this specific icon and not all bootstrap up/down icons.
